column4: Okay can someone help me with vnc problem. I am connecting to friend ubuntu box. I can't get cause there  a password on it. He doesn't remeber the password what do we do?
you can't fix it over vnc without a password, for obvious security reasons
you can use the recovery mod eoption to boot into single user mode and then run passwd
tell him to reboot, use the recovery option in the grub menu, and then type 'passwd the_username_here' when a shell comes up
